txt.en: Resplendent Shoulder Pads of Lothlórien Scroll Case[e]
On opening, the scroll case will reveal the Resplendent Shoulder Pads of Lothlórien recipe.\n\nYou must be friendly with the Galadhrim and Artisan of the Tailor's Guild to use this item.
Resplendent Shoulder Pads of Lothlórien Scroll Cases[ps]
